paragraphs.title: STEP I: Register the dataset using below PostgresSQL access options
paragraphs.text:
%snappydata

// this curly brackets around block of code prevents all the REPL output from being displayed ...
{
val datasetName = z.input("Enter Name for the Dataset:", "AirlineRef").asInstanceOf[String]
val url = z.input("Enter JDBC URL for Postgres:", "jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/")
val database = z.input("Enter Database Name:", "postgres").asInstanceOf[String]
val pgTable = z.input("Enter Table Name:", "AirlineDataWithRowID")
val user = z.input("Enter Username:", "postgres")
val password = z.input("Enter Password:", "postgres")

z.put("pgTable", pgTable)
z.put("datasetName", datasetName)
val urlWithDB = url + database
z.put("urlWithDB",urlWithDB)
z.put("user" ,user)
z.put("password",password)

var connectionString =s"create external table $datasetName using JDBC options (url '$urlWithDB', dbtable '$pgTable', user '$user', password '$password', driver 'org.postgresql.Driver'"
z.put("connectionString",connectionString)
}

paragraphs.title: STEP II :Enter additional parameters here...

Enter optional parameters in the form of.name: Enter optional parameters in the form of <key>=<value> separated by comma (,)
Enter optional parameters in the form of.displayName: Enter optional parameters in the form of <key>=<value> separated by comma (,)

msg.data:
No extra parameter added

External table named ds_postgres registered.
====== Schema for ds_postgres ======
root
 |-- id: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- name: string (nullable = false)
 |-- age: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- address: string (nullable = true)
 |-- salary: float (nullable = true)

paragraphs.title: STEP III : Lets take a look at some sample data
paragraphs.text:
%snappydata println(s"""%html

Records from the dataset Created

""") val dfm=z.get("datasetName").asInstanceOf[String] val dfs = snc.table(dfm) z.show(dfs)

msg.data:
Records from the dataset Created

dfm: String = ds_postgres dfs: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: int, name: string ... 3 more fields]

id	name	age	address	salary
1	Bhagyashri Patil	21	Pune                                              	15000.0

paragraphs.title: STEP IV: Cache the data in SnappyData Column/Row table
paragraphs.text:
%snappydata
{
import org.apache.spark.sql.SnappySession

val ss = new SnappySession(snc.sparkContext)

val datasetName = z.get("datasetName")
val tabName = datasetName+ "_cache"

val tableType = z.select("SnappyData Table type", Seq(("column" ,"Column"),
                                                    ("row","row"))).asInstanceOf[String]
ss.sql(s"drop table if exists $tabName")
ss.sql(s"create table $tabName using $tableType as select * from $datasetName" )

println(s"Created table named $tabName")
println("With row count = " + ss.table(s"$tabName").count )
}

msg.data:
Created table named agentsDataset_cache
With row count = 12
